text: Thanks <@U01QVR44MEY>, can you clarify what you mean by just internal in this situation? And the cookie is required for authentication? I presume it’s a HubSpot provided cookie?

When I say internal it means there is an endpoint HubSpot just uses it for internal purposes, not for customers to use. If you want to see it in action you can checkout the network tab when you're uploading a file. The endpoint that you're looking for is this one
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/api/presentations/v1/deck/upload>```

Hi everyone. I've been trying to create a language variation for certain blog post `POST*/cms/v3/blogs/posts/multi-language/create-language-variation*`, programmatically via API v3. I followed the documentation instructions, but I'm getting a 400. `{"correlationId":"346a18e6-a440-4ce9-b9ca-407791ae1d21","message":"Blog does not have a variation for language fr-ca","status":"error"}`. Of course it doesn't have a variation, I'm trying to create it through this API call. Any hint on this issue?

Hi team, has anyone been able to expose the Association Labels via the API?
If so, which call and how did you target the Association Labels? We have a Custom Object (Job Position) that we associate to a Contact and I want to report on the number of Contacts associated to a Position. Any suggestions welcome.

i remember reading this a few days ago and just ran into this
“The search endpoints are rate limited to four requests per second.”

sigh

How are you programming around the 4 requests per second on the search endpoints? I don’t see a way to look up against this 4 requests per second on this page, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/usage-details> — so I’m not exactly sure what I should be doing here. Whats the best way you found to go around this?
Hey Super smart folk — I know you can attach stuff to deals manually but my tired eyes aren’t seeing anything like this in the docs from the API. Anybody have any experience with that? School me HARD
engagements api — and you use a file id from the file upload api I believe
lemme see if I can track this down real quick

SO, not sure if this is the best way, but this is the way that I know..
upload file (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files> - docs here don’t have the return information, so you’ll need to figure that out.. i’m guessing the id will be the file id)

Then create some sort of engagement, and add the attachment. example using the engagements api/ notes

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/notes>

<https://share.getcloudapp.com/P8u7m95m>

I think this will do what you need it to do
Lol not sure if that is best practice, but it is my practice :upside_down_face::upside_down_face::clown_face::clown_face:

Fixed the issue. The blogs need an extra step before being able to create the language variants for each post. More info is here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/blog/create-a-multi-language-blog>

 Once you have that set, the API call works.
